content:
In a few days, I am moving to Reykjavik to start my postgraduate program!
I don't believe many other Lean users will be in the area, but I figured it wouldn't hurt to start a thread.

I have training in programming and differential geometry, and am currently using Lean to prove some theorems in algebraic geometry. I will also be completing a masters/PhD with Tarmo Uustalu in the distributed systems space :)
Welcome to Reykjavik! Let me know when you're here and we'll meet up! I've met your advisor once -- I'm at the other university but it's just a five minute bike ride away.
Hey! I'm going to be in Reykjavik from October as a Postdoc at the University of Reykjavik, also working with Tarmo. Looking forward to meeting everyone there!
